overview_of_class: The emphasis in this course is on theory and proofs. It is designed to prepare students to take 300-level mathematics courses such as 321 and 331 as sophomores. Linear algebra, similar to 240, but in greater depth. Topics include vectors, inner product, systems of linear equations, and linear transformations.
name: Accelerated Mathematics for MMSS: First Year
title: WCAS MATH 285-1-61 Accelerated Mathematics for MMSS: First Year
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Math Methods in Social Sciences Students only

Reserved for Math Methods in Social Sciences Students only

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The emphasis in this course is on theory and proofs. It is designed to prepare students to take 300-level mathematics courses such as 321 and 331 as sophomores. Linear algebra, similar to 240, but in greater depth. Topics include vectors, inner product, systems of linear equations, and linear transformations.
